comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Quote from: Chuchu90000 on August 21, 2023, 11:04:05 AMI understand that for you the request is ridiculous or false, lots of people want to make free money or scammer, Oh, it's all good... as long as you've got it. I was almost worried we'd have to break it down for you like you're a toddler.Quote from: Chuchu90000 on August 21, 2023, 11:04:05 AMin addition I am a newbie, but I am very serious and ready to prove everything I have nothing to hide. my request and very serious otherwise I won't have asked and I won't even discuss with you üòÅThere's no proof in the world that can back up how serious your claim is or if what you're saying is even true.On this forum, only two things count as good enough collateral for a loan:a) Your reputation within the communityb) Tangible collateral such as other cryptocurrencies or actual physical thingsAnd, well, you don't really have either of those.

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Quote from: Chuchu90000 on August 21, 2023, 01:33:10 PMDont have a physical things ? You read my text ? I don't have crypto collateral , I have valuable physical objects I have marked it in the description of my request. have you read ? Yep, I read your text. You said, "Collateral: none"! So, do you actually have collateral or not?Then you mentioned "small valuable item." What exactly does that mean? Are you suggesting using physical items as collateral for a loan? If that's the case, you need to clarify the items you're putting up and be prepared to send them to the lender's physical address (and cover the shipping costs). Are you ready to do that?
